ygData.subject: RE: Song Fizzles upon leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: My songs also seems to fizzle for me more frequently when my packet loss is high.  I believe that the client calls it a fizzle when I attempt to start a
ygData.messageBody:
My songs also seems to "fizzle" for me more frequently when my packet loss
is high. I believe that the client calls it a "fizzle" when I attempt to
start a song and the server doesn't respond in a fixed amount of time.

Crier Sharpsong, 41st song bard on Fennin Ro

<snip>

> BTW, both my CHA and DEX are over 100, so I should have a 5% fizzle rate
> anyway (assuming skill is maxed at previous level). I continued to fight
> and my singing skill went up quickly and was maxed in just a few fights,
> then I ran home and bought Verses, came back and am now back to 5%
> fizzles.
>
> Uldar Ulfangson
> 36th Bard, Rodcet Nife
